thread.title: New Al Golden Banners Fly Above Canes Game
thread.title_full: New Al Golden Banners Fly Above Canes Game

author: ARI MONT
title: New Al Golden Banners Fly Above Canes Game
text:
Former Canes Star Blades Has Advice for Al Golden -- Two new banners flew over Sun Life Stadium Saturday ahead of the University of Miami's football game against Virginia Tech. The banners reading "True Canes <3 Golden" and "Keep Golden. Class Not Trash -LLMM" are rumored to have been paid for by Laurence Leavy, also known as the Marlins Man. In past weeks banners have flown over Canes games calling for the firing of Al Golden. Published at 1:25 PM EDT on Oct 17, 2015
